desc: Well organized information about old bicycles. Indispensible if you are doing a fixie conversion of a vintage bicycle. Sheldon Brown the man died in 2008, but the site is still maintained.
Free fonts, some very interesting historical ones, my favicon is Altenglisch.
I have been watching these two since episode 9 of Project Binky, there really is nothing like it on the internet.
Another Car project channel, the standard of engineering here is very high, especially his landspeed car.
Knitting machines and information on how you can hack them.
I have been watching Clickspring almost since its inception, the quality of fabrication is very high, I particularly like his videos on reverse engineering ancient clockmaking techniques.
